title: Google\Cloud\Translate\V3\Glossary\LanguageCodePair
name: LanguageCodePair
description:
Used with unidirectional glossaries.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.translation.v3.Glossary.LanguageCodePair

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.source_language_code
params.description: Required. The BCP-47 language code of the input text, for example, "en-US". Expected to be an exact match for GlossaryTerm.language_code.

params.name: data.target_language_code
params.description: Required. The BCP-47 language code for translation output, for example, "zh-CN". Expected to be an exact match for GlossaryTerm.language_code.
